alert.note: Alert for Choctaw (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 12 at 10:46AM CDT until October 12 at 11:30AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Choctaw County in southwestern Alabama... * Until 1130 AM CDT. * At 1046 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles northwest of Pennington, or 12 miles north of Butler, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Pennington. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
